I am wondering the same. I'm looking to integrate social-auth, per object permissions with the registration.  I'm looking at: https://bitbucket.org/sarvi/django-userena.   Django-userena looks nice as it works with django-guardian but Sarvi has forked it to work with django-social-auth.  Thoughts?
my mistake the link i posted uses django-socialauth not django-social-auth
